value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?

This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead. value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)

value.title: Simulate Hierarchies with Field Parameters in Power BI
